import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Take ownership of asset"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/{assetId}/take-ownership"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Assigns the current authenticated user as the owner of the specified asset. This is a convenience endpoint that automatically uses the caller's user ID as the new owner.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) to identify the asset and extract `Items[].AssetId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for asset: [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) with tag or serial filter.
2. Call [POST /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}/take-ownership](/docs/api/assets/take-asset-ownership) to claim the asset.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `assetId` (path only - no request body needed).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the asset to take ownership of","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
